description: The Highway Mileage Report is an annual publication that lists the mileage of roadway and maintenance jurisdiction/ownership of roadways within each municipality of New York State. Information is current as of the publication date.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Transportation
metadata.description: The Highway Mileage Report is an annual publication that lists the mileage of roadway and maintenance jurisdiction/ownership of roadways within each municipality of New York State. Information is current as of the publication date.

name: Highway Mileage: Beginning 2008
